TAG.COMMENT: - To trigger ad-hoc Risk Assessments from Assessment Tasks form. . A valid plan and other relevant details can be picked up and an adhoc assessment can be triggered to selected assessor. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Function gets referred by another Procedure Pr_Trigger_risk_Assessments in this API.
- This Procedure gets all the details of the task and generates the assignment by calling child functions

TAG.COMMENT: - Function gets referred by all function in this API.
- To get degug messages. Debug will be available in ms_apps_message_log table with log_key 'PLNRSKASGN'.
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Populate_Rsk_Assmn_Tbl in this API and also from property files for word reports.
- To get the range of a score - The function will accept a numerical value as input and give the curresponding range as output
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Route_Assignment in this API. Will be called only if default to previous assessment is set to yes.

- This Function will be called to poppulate To Populate_Rsk_Assmnt_Table with previous assessmnt details. MS_Rsk_Trigger_Assessments.Populate_Rsk_Assmnt_Table will be called to insert data into the assessment table.
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Route_Assignment in this API.

- To retrive the vaules and to poppulate the values into the type one the values are puppulated in the type the package MS_Rsk_Trigger_Assessments.Populate_Rsk_Assmnt_Table will be called to insert data into the assessment table.
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Route_Assignment in this API.
- To split assignment due date to the count of assignees and call Si_Ems_Sv to insert data into si_event_assignments table
- Function gets referred by another function Pr_Trigger_risk_Assessments in this API.
- Get the List of Assignees considered for assignment and Calls Fn_Populate_Rsk_Assmn_Tbl Also on sucess calls Fn_Triggr_Asgnmnt to trigger the assignments
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Get_Asgn_Other_Details in this API.
- Derive Process Instance Id,Instance Id and Master Record Id

TAG.COMMENT: - Function gets referred by another function Fn_Determine_What_To_Trigger in this API.
- Function for determining whether Assessment is to be triggered today.
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Determine_What_To_Trigger in this API.
- To get the next schedule date for any Plan with Scheduling frequency. Based on the next schedule date of the Plan, it is determined whether an assignment has to be generated.
- Function gets referred by another function in this API.
- To get the Assignment due date
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Populate_Rsk_Assmn_Tbl in this API.
- To get the range of a score - The function will accept a numerical value as input and give the curresponding range as output
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Route_Assignment in this API. Will be called only if default to previous assessment is set to yes.

- This Function will be called to poppulate To Populate_Rsk_Assmnt_Table with previous assessmnt details. MS_Rsk_Trigger_Assessments.Populate_Rsk_Assmnt_Table will be called to insert data into the assessment table.
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Route_Assignment in this API.

- To retrive the vaules and to poppulate the values into the type one the values are puppulated in the type the package MS_Rsk_Trigger_Assessments.Populate_Rsk_Assmnt_Table will be called to insert data into the assessment table.
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Route_Assignment in this API.
- To split assignment due date to the count of assignees and call Si_Ems_Sv to insert data into si_event_assignments table
- Function gets referred by another function Pr_Trigger_risk_Assessments in this API.
- Get the List of Assignees considered for assignment and Calls Fn_Populate_Rsk_Assmn_Tbl Also on sucess calls Fn_Triggr_Asgnmnt to trigger the assignments
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Get_Asgn_Other_Details in this API.
- Get the list of Assignes based on the Role if Assessor(s) have not been defined.
- Function gets referred by another function Fn_Get_Asgn_Other_Details in this API.
- Derive Process Instance Id,Instance Id and Master Record Id
- Function gets referred by another function Pr_Trigger_risk_Assessments in this API.
- Calls functions to get assignments ids (Fn_Get_Assignment_Ids) and assigniees (Fn_Get_Assignees).
- Function gets referred by another function Pr_Trigger_risk_Assessments in this API.
- Creates Assignment Id, Assignment text and Flow Start_tage .
- Function gets referred by another function Pr_Trigger_risk_Assessments in this API.
- Defines the activity, active owners count and active owners for the assignment .
- Function gets referred by another function Pr_Trigger_risk_Assessments in this API.

- This function checks whether the purticular plan has to be considered for assignment and gets the next schedule date if considered for assignment by calling the functions Fn_Consider_Rec_For_Asgnmnt and Fn_Get_Next_Schedule_Date respectvely .

TAG.COMMENT: - To Poppulate Tables with Rollup Scores. Data from scoreing table will be processed here to arrive at the rollup for organization, process and risk. MS_RSK_CALCULATE_ROLLUP_SCORES Scheduled infolet will call Pr_Refresh_Hirarchy. Rollup will be calulated for parrent basded on the immediate child score. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Function gets referred by all function in this Package.
- To get degug messages. Debug will be available in ms_apps_message_log table with log_key 'RSKROLLUP'.
- Procedure gets referred by another procedure Pr_Process_Rollup_Scores from the same package

- To calculate the hirarchical rollup for organizations. Get all data from MS_RSK_ORGANIZATION_Scoring where roll_up falg is N Calculate the scores(average of all assessments done) for the lowest level child Then rolling up it to the parrent levels.
- Procedure gets referred by another procedure Pr_Process_Rollup_Scores from the same package

- To calculate the hirarchical rollup for organizations. Get all data from ms_rsk_core_object_Scoring where roll_up falg is N Calculate the scores(average of all assessments done) for the lowest level child Then rolling up it to the parrent levels.
- Procedure gets referred by another procedure Pr_Process_Rollup_Scores from the same package

- To calculate the hirarchical rollup for organizations. Get all data from MS_RSK_SCORING where roll_up falg is N Calculate the scores(average of all assessments done) for the lowest level child Then rolling up it to the parrent levels.

FUNCTION.NAME: FN_RISK_ROLLUP_RAM
FUNCTION.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: rollup logic changes for sp2 start
FUNCTION.COMMENT: rollup logic changes for sp2 start

TAG.COMMENT: - Procedure gets referred by another procedure Pr_Refresh_Hirarchy from the same package
- To get all scenario id and Call the rollup functions based on different assessment types.
- Procedure gets referred by scheduled Infolet MS_RSK_CALCULATE_ROLLUP_SCORES.
- To clears the MS_RSK_ORG_LEVELS, MS_RSK_CORE_OBJECT_LEVELS and core object level and MS_RSK_RISK_LEVELS tables and popultes it with fresh hirarchy level data from GRC maintanence..
